General.Name: JP Nelson Holdings
General.Description: JP Nelson Holdings (Cayman), together with its subsidiaries, leases, sells, and services equipment for engineering, construction, shipyard/shipbuilding, oil and gas, and offshore industries in Singapore, Asia, Oceania, and internationally. The company offers crawler, mobile, mini, telescopic, and rough terrain cranes; hydraulic, mini, and doosan excavators; and drill and boring rigs, bulldozers, desanders, air compressors, diesel generators, glass lifters, hydraulic grabs, boom lifts, piling rings, vibratory rollers, hydraulic vibratory hammers, welding sets, grounding pumps, power packs, vibroflots, welding equipment, wheel loaders, and lighting towers. It is also involved in the trading, rental, and maintenance of excavators, forklifts, and generators; sale and leasing of machines for construction and civil engineering use; and land and office building rental business. JP Nelson Holdings (Cayman) was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 57, Chongqing South Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 100
